title: Taylor Swift's Eras Tour Film Breaks Streaming Records in 2025
shortdescription: The Eras Tour movie becomes the most-watched concert film ever on Disney+ — beating Beyoncé and BTS.
description: Taylor Swift continues to dominate 2025 as her Eras Tour film shatters streaming records on Disney+, surpassing previous concert film benchmarks set by Beyoncé's Renaissance and BTS' Permission to Dance on Stage.
author: Emma Chen

title: Spotify Wrapped 2025: AI DJ, Mood Mixtapes & New Features Leaked
shortdescription: Your 2025 Wrapped will include AI-generated commentary, mood-based playlists, and surprise artist videos.
description: Leaked documents reveal Spotify Wrapped 2025 will feature an AI DJ narrating your year in music, mood-ring playlists, and personalized video messages from top artists.
author: Marcus Johnson

title: Adele Confirms New Album for 2025 — Her First Since '30'
shortdescription: Adele teases '33' — her most personal album yet, recorded in Los Angeles and London.
description: After a three-year hiatus, Adele has confirmed her fourth studio album titled '33' will release in 2025, featuring collaborations with Greg Kurstin and Max Martin.
author: Sophie Laurent
